TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit FileLoadException extends System.IO.IOException

summary.span: 已找到 Managed 組件卻無法載入時所擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when a managed assembly is found but cannot be loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示所發生的錯誤時找到檔案，但無法載入。Represents the error that occurs when a file is found but cannot be loaded. 無法載入，因為它找不到檔案時，會擲回例外狀況。The exception is thrown when the file fails to load because it cannot be located. 如果檔案，但無法載入，因為權限不足，就會擲回。If the file is located, but cannot be loaded due to insufficient permissions, a is thrown. `FileLoadException` 具有預設 COR_E_FILELOAD HRESULT，其中包含值 0x80131621，但這不是唯一可能的 HRESULT。`FileLoadException` has the default HRESULT of COR_E_FILELOAD, which has the value 0x80131621, but this is not the only possible HRESULT. 如果您的程式碼並沒有權限，錯誤訊息，此例外狀況可能只包含檔案或目錄的名稱，而非完整路徑。If your code does not have permission, the error message for this exception may only contain file or directory names instead of fully qualified paths. > [!NOTE] > 這個例外狀況不會包含在[適用於 Windows 市集應用程式](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912)或[可攜式類別庫](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md)，但它的某些成員所擲回。This exception is not included in the [.NET for Windows Store apps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) or the [Portable Class Library](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md), but it is thrown by some members that are. 若要在此情況下攔截例外狀況，請撰寫`catch`陳述式改為。To catch the exception in that case, write a `catch` statement for instead. **相關的秘訣****Associated Tips** **請確定檔案是有效的.NET Framework 組件。****Make sure that the file is a valid .NET Framework assembly.** 如果該檔案不是有效的 .NET Framework 組件，就會擲回這個例外狀況。This exception is thrown if the file is not a valid .NET Framework assembly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . **請檢查並確定組件或模組未載入兩次以兩個不同的辨識項。****Check to make sure an assembly or module was not loaded twice with two different evidences.** 所謂的辨識項是一組資訊，由輸入的安全性原則決策所構成，例如要將那些權限授與給程式碼。Evidence is the set of information that constitutes input to security policy decisions, such as what permissions can be granted to code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 和 。For more information, see and **如果使用或方法，請先確定組件名稱未超過系統定義的長度上限。****If using the or methods, check to make sure the assembly name is not longer than the system-defined maximum length.** 組件名稱長度不得超過系統定義的最大值。The assembly name's length cannot exceed the system-defined maximum. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . **如果載入附屬組件，請確定指定的 cultureinfo 需符合該檔案的 CultureInfo。****If loading a satellite assembly, make sure the specified CultureInfo matches the file's CultureInfo.** 附屬組件包含了當地語系化資源，這些資源中含有不能當地語系化的可執行程式碼。附屬組件也包含了單一文化的資源，用以做為預設或中性文化。Satellite assemblies contain localized resources which contain non-localizable executable code and resources for a single culture that serve as the default or neutral culture. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，將新執行個體的 屬性設定為系統提供的說明錯誤的訊息，例如「無法載入指定的檔案」。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, setting the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Could not load the specified file."

summary.span: 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。

span.span: This message takes into account the current system culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性和的新執行個體的屬性會初始化為`null`。The property and property of the new instance are initialized to `null`.

param.name: message
param.span: 描述錯誤的 。

span.span: A that describes the error.

param.span: 「訊息」的內容必須能讓人了解。

span.span: The content of message is intended to be understood by humans.

param.span: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

span.span: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化屬性的新執行個體使用`message`。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance using `message`. 屬性和的新執行個體的屬性會初始化為`null`。The property and property of the new instance are initialized to `null`.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. `InnerException` 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 `InnerException`。The `InnerException` property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the `InnerException` property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||內部例外狀況參考。The inner exception reference.| ||錯誤訊息字串。The error message string.| 如需有關內部例外狀況的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on inner exceptions, see .

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and the name of the file that could not be loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化屬性的新執行個體使用`message`和屬性使用`fileName`。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance using `message` and the property using `fileName`. 的新執行個體的屬性會初始化為`null`。The property of the new instance is initialized to `null`. 不需要是儲存在磁碟上的檔案它可以支援資料流存取系統的任何部分。 is not required to be a file stored on disk; it can be any part of a system that supports access to streams. 例如，根據系統中，這個類別可能無法存取實體裝置。For example, depending on the system, this class might be able to access a physical device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. `InnerException` 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 `InnerException`。The `InnerException` property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the `InnerException` property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 不需要是儲存在磁碟上的檔案它可以支援資料流存取系統的任何部分。 is not required to be a file stored on disk; it can be any part of a system that supports access to streams. 例如，根據系統中，這個類別可能無法存取實體裝置。For example, depending on the system, this class might be able to access a physical device. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||內部例外狀況參考。The inner exception reference.| ||錯誤訊息字串。The error message string.| 如需有關內部例外狀況的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on inner exceptions, see .

summary.span: 取得造成這個例外狀況的檔案名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the file that causes this exception.

value.span: 包含具有無效影像的檔案名稱的 ，如果沒有檔案名稱傳遞給目前執行個體的建構函式，則為 null 參考。

span.span: A containing the name of the file with the invalid image, or a null reference if no file name was passed to the constructor for the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有的話，這個屬性會傳回目前執行個體的建構函式提供的檔案名稱。This property returns the name of the file supplied to the constructor for the current instance, if any. 如果未指定檔案名稱，或為 null 參考，這個屬性會傳回 null 參考。If the file name was not specified or is a null reference, this property returns a null reference. 這個屬性是唯讀的。This property is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Message As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Message { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得造成這個例外狀況的錯誤訊息和檔案名稱。

span.span: Gets the error message and the name of the file that caused this exception.

value.span: 字串，包含造成這個例外狀況的錯誤訊息和檔案名稱。

span.span: A string containing the error message and the name of the file that caused this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會覆寫。This property overrides . 如果目前的例外狀況的建構函式不提供的任何訊息，這個屬性會傳回系統提供的錯誤訊息。If no message was supplied to the constructor for the current exception, this property returns a system-supplied error message. 如果屬性不是 null 參考，此訊息包含檔案名稱，例如 「 無法載入檔案`FileName`。 」If the property is not a null reference, the message includes the file name, for example, "Unable to load file a `FileName`." (`FileName`代表所傳回的值。)如果是`null`，這表示為"(null)"的系統提供的訊息中。(a `FileName` represents the value returned by .) If is `null`, this is indicated in the system-supplied message as "(null)". 系統提供的訊息會考量目前系統文化特性。The system-supplied message takes into account the current system culture. 這個屬性是唯讀的。This property is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 傳回目前例外狀況的完整名稱、可能的錯誤訊息、內部例外的名稱和堆疊追蹤。

span.span: Returns the fully qualified name of the current exception, and possibly the error message, the name of the inner exception, and the stack trace.

returns.span: 字串，包含這個例外狀況的完整名稱、可能的錯誤訊息、內部例外的名稱和堆疊追蹤 (視使用哪個 建構函式而定)。

span.span: A string containing the fully qualified name of this exception, and possibly the error message, the name of the inner exception, and the stack trace, depending on which constructor is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法覆寫 。This method overrides . 這個方法所傳回的字串表示法包含例外狀況，值名稱值屬性，並呼叫。The string representation returned by this method includes the name of the exception, the value of the the value of the property, and the result of calling . 如果任何這些成員為 null 參考，其值不會包含在傳回的字串。If any of these members is a null reference, its value is not included in the returned string.
